div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1565 Antakya (anc. Antiocheia), Seleucis, 1932-1939 Burial: c. 125-120 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 5 AE. From excavations Alexander II Zebina: (Antiocheia) Disposition: Antakya? Waage, Antioch on the Orontes, IV.2 (Princeton, 1952), p. 19
